scheduler.name: scheduler
scheduler.label: FlowMatch Discrete Scheduler
scheduler.description: The FlowMatch Discrete Scheduler is a scheduler for the LTX2 19B model.

inputs.prompt:
The man is seated in dim, warm lamplight that barely reaches his eyes.  
Very slowly — almost in slow motion — his head tilts upward until his gaze finds the lens.

His eyes lock on with predatory focus: pupils slightly dilated, unblinking, the whites stark against the low light.

A faint, lopsided smile begins to crawl across his mouth — the kind that starts polite but never quite arrives at friendly.

He leans forward inch by deliberate inch, closing the distance between himself and the viewer.

Soft, almost tender voice, barely above a whisper:

“Wanna come to my Neverland Ranch…?”

He holds the silence.  
The smile keeps growing — wider, tighter, wrong — teeth now fully visible while the eyes remain cold and fixed.

No blink.  
No mercy in the stare.

The grin stretches into something grotesque and intimate at the same time, like he's sharing a secret only the two of you understand.

He stays frozen in that exact position — too long, far too long — letting the discomfort curdle in the viewer's chest before anything else happens.
